title: Brasserie Sauveniere
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Organic, Western, Beer/Wine, Belgian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Funky informal brasserie attached to an indie cinema. Offers plenty of vegan and vegetarian choices such as salads and quiche on the menu, plus 3 or 4 veggie specials each day (stuffed peppers, pasta, soup, etc). Serves several local and organic beers and wines. Lunch and dinner is served every day until late. Free Wi-Fi.
